website_summaries.verdict: Though not as strong as some competing brands, happy customers report satisfaction with their  ashy or platinum shade.
pros: A well-balanced shampoo that tones down most brassy shades while conditioning hair
Earns praise for leaving hair soft and shiny
cons: Doesn't have the best smell and doesn't lather very well
Requires several uses for visible results, and some consumers don't see much of a difference at all

website_summaries.verdict: Great for getting the brassiness out of hair that's had a drastic change of color, including Asian hair.
pros: Strong purple remedy for keeping brassiness at bay or to tone down yellowing
Also worked well on naturally silver hair
cons: Not very sudsy, which was especially difficult for those with thick hair

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Happy with my results! My hair didn’t turn silver like some people claimed, but it definitely lightened up and took out some of the orange tones. Also, it didn’t leave my hair feeling dry or damaged. Awesome deal for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, I love this product! I have very dark brown hair and had blond highlights and this shampoo brought the brassiness out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Does its job
customer_reviews.text: My hair was starting to lose its toner and become yellow and brassy and in one wash it left it looking salon worthy again. This definitely shouldn't be used more than once a week because it can turn you hair greenish but once a week, or even once every two weeks will keep your hair with no need for toner for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Eleane C

customer_reviews.title: Big Warning ahead
customer_reviews.text: Three major reasons why I can't recommend this product: 1. Dry and shrink right away after you apply to your hair. Does not bubble up so well and even a second wash won't make your hair feel clean. 2. The most major concern for me is it cause severe irritation on me while I am still in shower. The purple pigmentation touches my leg and then it itches after it dries up. Please test it on your neck or your wrist before use it in shower. 3. If you have multiple colors on your hair, this shampoo will separate those colors so your pretty graduation/layers will be gone, and it is so awkward...
customer_reviews.author: Amoosa

customer_reviews.title: Knockoff!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this product from Ulta with no issues, and decided to give it a shot buying from amazon because of the faster shipping. The color was a dark purple like what I buy normally, but the consistency of the shampoo was way off from the first time I tried to use it. Definitely not the same thing product I’ve used in the past! Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley L Whittaker

customer_reviews.title: Great purple shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Great for toning down the brassy yellow in highlighted hair. Warning!!! It will stain your white bathtub, be sure to rinse your tub when you are finished!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Burton

customer_reviews.title: Best toning shampoo for anyone! Big bottle!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing and truly does it’s job! I have naturally dark brown thick hair and get a balayage done to it, which always gets brassy way too soon. I’ve tried another product from amazon’s list which hardly worked and the bottle was tiny.... this one worked on the FIRST attempt and lifted SO MUCH. The bottle is ginormous and well worth the money. Promise you won’t be let down. A trick for those who don’t yet know: apply any toning shampoo to dry hair doe BEST results.
customer_reviews.author: Gee

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I don't necessarily like is that I have thick hair and the shampoo ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first purple shampoo I have tried. The bottle recommends only using 2-3 times per week, but every time I use it, I get comments about my hair looking blonder that day, so it must work! The only thing I don't necessarily like is that I have thick hair and the shampoo doesn't really lather up. So I still use a secondary shampoo on the under part of my hair so I can actually get it clean the whole way through.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews before buying this shampoo, I was a little leary about the comment the product left the hair dry. I've been using it for a week now and it makes my hair so soft. Granted I do use a blow drying cream but nevertheless, I'm loving it. I should probably mention that my hair is not over processed with color, and I'm using this for gray hair. I don't have a lot of gray but with black hair I wanted the gray to shine and not be dull and yellowish. It's not overly expensive and I would recommend to anyone...give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: canyoncondor

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting...
customer_reviews.text: Usually I use Matrix Brass Off for my hair since I am a natural brunette and my hair is dyed multiple shades of blonde throughout. I wanted to switch it up and try something new but this is not it. It dried my hair out entirely too much and made it very brittle. And no, it was not from my hair being bleached. This was 4-5 weeks after having my color touched up that I tried this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo for grey/silver hair!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this shampoo to replace a shampoo I couldn’t get during the pandemic. I have grey/silver hair so I want something that will keep my hair from yellowing. I am very pleased with this shampoo. It is purple and it has done the job. My hair looks healthy and the color is perfect. I will continue to purchase this shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: gammas

customer_reviews.title: NOT TWO SHAMPOOS AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: Two shampoos are pictured. Someone even asked the question of whether or not Thisbe was the shampoo AND conditioner to which someone else responded that they received TWO shampoos (which is what I thought I was getting). Nope. Only one bottle. I would have never paid that much for only one bottle. Returning tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hipp

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy Framesi color lover brand but decided to try this because it was quite a bit cheaper. The scent is fine but I don’t feel as though it keeps the brass color out of my blond like the Framesi does. I keep the Framesi in my hair for 1 minute and a light purple color remains in a couple strips of my hair until the next wash but then goes back to the very blonde. This I leave it sit for 3-5 minutes and it does nothing. I would be willing to buy this brand for regular shampoo but I will not buy the purple in this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: John Smay

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: At first I wasn't impressed with this shampoo but after 3 uses I could tell a difference with the brassy tone. It was almost unnoticeable and it had lightened up the blonde highlights. One complaint I have is that it's almost lightened up my highlights to much. So I am reducing my use to just a couple of times a week instead of 3-4
customer_reviews.author: RobynAlexis12

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this shampoo. I bought it to take out the brass in my blonde highlights. Sorry to say, it doesn't work for my hair. I will go back to using the blue Shimmer Lights generic from Sally Beauty Supply, which always does the trick, and at a much better price. Love Joico's K-Pak and other products, but this shampoo was a miss.
customer_reviews.author: P. L. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Live this product I just began using purple shampoo and conditioner again and I love joicos normal shampoo and conditioner for colored hair and thought I would try their purple collection! I have only used it for a little over a week and see such a difference in the brightness of my hair! Great thing is that it isn’t drying to my hair either! I typically was my hair twice a week and use purple shampoo and conditioner once a week rotating it with my normal the other time!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Zentz

customer_reviews.title: This was recommended to me by my hair stylist
customer_reviews.text: Totally my go to purple shampoo. This was recommended to me by my hair stylist. My Asian hair is bleached multiple times for balayage and babylights. This is shampoo does not dry out my hair like others and you can use it every time you wash your hair. For the affordable price it works just as good or even better than the $50 ones
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: This product blew my mind!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but I feel this is important to know. My hair is naturally strawberry blonde but I have it highlighted with high and low lights. My hair tends to take a yellowish/brassy tone after a few weeks of the highlight. This shampoo is amazing!!!! I wash my hair using rubber gloves bc it stains your hands. I leave the shampoo in my hair the entire time I shower and then follow with the conditioner. My hair always comes out with an ashy, cooler blonde that you could never have if you highlighted it. I suggest getting this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price tag
customer_reviews.text: I personally did not see great results with this product. I will say, it smells great and does not dry out your hair like most purple shampoos. But still not worth the price to me, due to the fact that I saw very little results. After purchasing, I went to Sally's and got Generic brand shampoo and conditioner. I spend almost half the amount, got more product and much better results. I usually don't write negative reviews. Just wanted to save the next girl a little money. So if you're looking for a great toning shampoo, I'd recommend skipping out on this one and just buying Generic brand.
customer_reviews.author: Seth O'Neal

customer_reviews.title: How to use as a mask vs shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I used this product as many advertised, by leaving it on for extended time. Some said 24 hours. I did mine for 1.5 hours with a shower cap. I then rinsed and used Biolage Hydrasource alone conditioning balm. This product does remove brassy tones. It will dry you hair out, only use with mask-like conditioner to recover. I
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t do well for me.
customer_reviews.text: This purple shampoo smells OK. But, it left dark spots all in my blonde. I only left it on for the time stated on the back of the bottle. I don’t understand what I could’ve done wrong. So it got returned. The first use, it really brightened my hair, but it left a spot in my blonde. Then the second use, did not do anything but leave more spots throughout my hair. It dried my hair out a pretty good bit but I consistently used conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: SDH

customer_reviews.title: Only shampoo!! Ripoff
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand of purple shampoo/conditioner for my bleach blonde hair but this is misleading. Why do you should both shampoo and conditioner botttles in your pictures if this is ONLY for the shampoo. I wouldn’t have bought it if I knew this did not Include conditioner too.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley

customer_reviews.title: High pigment but drying
customer_reviews.text: It’s not super moisturizing in fact it’s very drying but that’s with all purple shampoo. It left bits Of my platinum hair light purple but once I dried my hair it was not as noticeable. It’s my own fault cuz I used it in my dry blonde hair. I think it works really well and it really works well over time so don’t expect super drastic change after one wash. And don’t put it on dry hair and then rinse because blonde hair is like a sponge and you’ll have purple left over.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah P

customer_reviews.title: Not what I needed to remove the brassy yellow from my white hair
customer_reviews.text: OMG! My hair is purple now. Seriously purple. This stuff dyes your hair quick if you're not careful. Be careful. Unless you're going for purple and not white.
customer_reviews.author: FabFitFree

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: I was always using the old school clairol purple shampoo stuff in years past, then purchased a purple shampoo on here called "Fiona", i think. Well then I purchased this one b/c a YouTuber suggested it. Well having tried all these mentioned, I have to say the Fiona one has been the best at getting my brassy-ness out and "refreshing" my highlights. This joico one does nothing for me. Honestly :(
customer_reviews.author: Brandon and Amy Marlow

customer_reviews.title: Great Shampoo and Conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo and conditioner, it gives my hair so much shine and brightens my silver. I shampoo my hair every day and it is not drying like other brands I've used. Not a day goes by that someone doesn't ask me if my hair color is natural, I get a lot of compliments on my hair which I never did when I was younger. It smells great and 1 bottle lasts me a long time. I would recommend it to anyone with grey or silver hair or blondes who want to cut the brassy tint to their hair.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product! Best purple shampoo I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purple shampoo I have ever used! Keeps my hair toned with just a hint of purple/grey tone which I love! The color doesnt build up and make my hair bright purple and splotchy like others that I have used! It also smells great! I would dedinitely recommend this priduct to anyone who wants to keep their bleached hair healthy and toned! I would also reccomend using the conditioner along with the shampoo for even better results!
customer_reviews.author: beautiful413**

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work For Me
customer_reviews.text: I saw all the great reviews and pics of brown brassy hair being saved by this Joico shampoo and decided to give it a try. I have medium brown hair. My stylist did highlights and they look harsh, brassy and orange. I am surprised she let me leave the salon like this. I lathered Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo on my wet head and let it sit for 10 minutes and rinsed it out, followed by soaking my hair in a hair mask for 5 minutes. After rinsing out the mask, I combed a Redkin Leave in Conditioner thru my hair. End result is no changes to original brassiness. On to the next quick fix.
customer_reviews.author: Amy W.

customer_reviews.title: I’m satisfied
customer_reviews.text: So far, I’ve only used this shampoo once, but I’m satisfied with the results. My stylist suggested using it once every 3-4 washes, so that’s what I’ll do. Also, I did notice slight staining under my nails, which lasted a couple days, but I’ll rectify that with wearing a thin pair of plastic gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Wilson

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Such a difference! I had a yellow blonde and now it’s a pretty good shade lighter, brighter, less brass! I got the small bottle to use as a treatment and to try it and I gotta say it’s really messy! Stains everywhere! Just wear gloves and an old shirt. I used it as recommended, mix it with a hair mask and sit for 15 minutes, then rinse and conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't deposit too much purple into my hair - leaves my yellowing highlights more silver and my orange strands more brown. I use this on dry hair and leave it in for 2-3 hours before washing it out. It's been half a year of using this shampoo and I can say that this color corrects my hair so much better than those color-depositing conditioners.
customer_reviews.author: Jes

customer_reviews.title: Really dark purple
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is a really dark purple compared to the ones I have used the past. Maybe that is why my highlights look brighter after one wash. I did mix the shampoo with briogeo mask when I used it. I left it on 3 minutes, rinsed and followed it with my HSI conditioner. Left that on while I finished finished my shower and rinsed that out. I put argan oil thru out my hair and let it air dry before I go to bed. Then in the morning I used my flat iron to style it.
customer_reviews.author: lynndoll10

customer_reviews.title: Scent good
customer_reviews.text: Do not recommend. Made my hair go from blonde to orange in one wash. Not happy. The product must be old or something. Do not use on blonde hair. Scent was good.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toning shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: I recently just purchased this and tried it out I was skeptical at first that it would actually work. I wet my hair left it in for 5 min. Rinsed with cold water and I could tell even with wet hair that my highlights where not as brassy as before. A word of caution is that it May turn your hands purple. I definitely would recommend for anyone who needs to toner to get rid of the brassy tones between going to the salon.
customer_reviews.author: Bryant L

customer_reviews.title: Bassy yellow be gone! 💘
customer_reviews.text: Soooo worth it. Washed my brassy yellow blond hair once! And it was like toner in my hair. I love this shampoo. Also, i didn't use the same purple correction con. I just used dove. Planning to die my hair soon but wanted to lighten with out damage first. So worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Julie vanover

customer_reviews.title: Going Grey
customer_reviews.text: My permed and color treated hair is drying out, particularly after I started using this product. I have yet to figure it out if it was the state of my hair or if adding this product is the reason for my straw like hair. Going grey from years of coloring it was suggested I needed this product. I'm not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Lois M Heffron

customer_reviews.title: Definitely takes away the brass
customer_reviews.text: I love that it takes away my brassy blonde tones, and it does have a nice scent, feels very soft when using and my hair is fine after using it. My issue is perhaps an allergy to the dyes. I find my scalp is very irritated for days after using it and I have to give it a rest for at least a week. I would not recommend using this shampoo more than once or twice a week.
customer_reviews.author: JuliaPhotoFL

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep out brassy and yellow tones in your hair
customer_reviews.text: I use this product once to twice a week to subdue the brassiness brought on by hard water and hair coloring, it really works. My husband has white hair and uses it to keep the yellow out of his white hair. Overall we are pleased with the product, and would recommend it to anyone who has these issues.
customer_reviews.author: Happyday81

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again...
customer_reviews.text: Like this product, it does exactly what you want it to. Just some advice , leave it on for the amount of time that's indicated, if you leave it on longer it will turn a lavender gray. I've learned from experience on that . But as long as you follow directions it turns your hair a beautiful color of a natural bright blonde.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy in Alabama

customer_reviews.title: Leaking Bottle
customer_reviews.text: Joico has been my favorite purple shampoo ever since I tried it for the first time around 8 months ago and let me tell you, I’ve tried A TON of different purple shampoos. However, I was disappointed when I opened the wrapper surrounding the shampoo bottle and discovered the bottle had leaked product. The star rating has nothing to do with the product’s quality, but reflects the poor condition that I received it in 😕
customer_reviews.author: Haley Nute

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed so far
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy this same shampoo from my salon, but with Covid, well I couldn't go. Bought this instead. Totally different consistency. It's almost like slime or snot and doesnt disperse easily. Also doesnt lather like the salon bottle. I'm almost afraid I got a counterfeit one or something. It also is really drying out my hair
customer_reviews.author: KAC

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This makes my hair crunchy and dry. I would use anyway except it hasn't made a difference after using a whole bottle. I was being patient and giving it time to work. The smell is pretty good, but i'll be trying a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My hairstylist friend introduced me to this originally and has become my favorite anti-brass shampoo. Keeps my blonde bright and is a decent price. Makes a major difference! Be careful not to overdo bc you will end up w temporary purple spots if your hair is light enough. The scent is nothing special but it’s not overwhelming. Would recommend a try to any blonde.
customer_reviews.author: MariskaGo

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo, just broken...
customer_reviews.text: I've order the shampoo before based on advice from a salon since I have dyed blonde hair. It's great, but top of the bottle cracked off the lid and the plastic is ripped through. While I wouldn't accuse the seller of anything, how do I know for sure that it wasn't tampered with? Overall really disappointed with the condition.
customer_reviews.author: ER

customer_reviews.title: Great product for freshly bleached hair
customer_reviews.text: I recently bleached my hair blonde and have been using some different products that really didn't work well. I looked up some online reviews and found the Joico brands for blonde hair. I've been using them a few days and have seen a major difference, in that my hair has a more natural feel rather than the straw-like damaged feel from the bleaching. It also seems to be keeping the tone of the hair and removing what little orange/brassy tone was in it. Am really pleased with the overall quality. Will definitely buy the shampoo and conditioner again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: I recieved conditioner not the shampoo I ordered. The shampoo is GREAT for my beard but I didn't want conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: It's kinda drying
customer_reviews.text: And I have softened water. It does tone pretty well, no staining of the tub or shower. If you have dry hair,you'd want to stagger this with moisturizing shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: avidreader

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: This brand was recommended by my stylist. Super affordable for a professional brand. I used half of this paired with my regular shampoo so as not to dry my hair out. No strong bleach fragrance as I expected there to be. So far I am really happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Anne

customer_reviews.title: My favorite purple shampoo by far
customer_reviews.text: My favorite purple shampoo by far. I usually get the smaller bottle, but I go through it so quickly. I leave this on my hair for about 15-20 min to get rid of grassiness and reds. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Above average but sometimes leaves residue
customer_reviews.text: This is better than many purple shampoos in terms of smell, cost, and result.. But I still have yet to find a perfect one. This isn't as strong as others and will only leave a light purple tint for about a day & will not stain hands or shower/tub tile. It does leave a slight sticky residue on hair though.
customer_reviews.author: GM15

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: this shampoo makes my silver hair shiny and soft! i use it about twice a week and leaving it on for several minutes does tint my hair purple, but i actually love the color and it only lasts a couple of washes. it is not a bold color, so not something that is really noticeable. using it for a shorter time (or washing it right out) just increases the shine of my hair. this brand doesn't have as strong a peroxide smell as some purple shampoos do and that is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: The smell isn't bad but it's not good either. Definitely not moisturizing, but that's not what it' is intended for. It took a lot of yellowish color from bleaching out of my hair and left it a pretty natural light blonde color. But unfortunately, it turned the lighter parts of my hair a lavender color, so make sure you don't leave it in for too long. Honestly, it was my own fault though, so I'm still giving it 5/5 stars. This is the only purple shampoo that can actually make a difference in my hair color!
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Yes. Yes. Yes!
customer_reviews.text: I have never been a fan of ME being a blonde. A lot has to do with maintenance and having hard well water- my hair instantly turns brassy. Well, this last winter I began my 30 year crisis (lol) and aimed for blonde. White blonde! This product has been a LIFESAVER! I have ended up with so many different shades of blonde! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Josie Adams

customer_reviews.title: Not 2 shampoos only 1
customer_reviews.text: So I have not even tried the shampoo yet but I’m disappointed because when buying this it said I was buying 2 shampoos when it got here there was only one in the box so I looked to see what it said and now it’s only saying 1. I actually looked just last night to see if it was a shampoo and a conditioner and in the comment section the person answering the question said it was 2 shampoos. Not really sure why I only got one and not very happy about it either.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Horrible buy , did nothing it promised .. left my hair feeling like plastic which I haven’t experienced in yearssss since I used cheap V05 , like literally disappointed ..SMH
customer_reviews.author: Tony May

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I dont know why this product has a lot of reviews. I use it everyday and my hair is still brassy. Its not even moisturized or soft. Maybe im not using it right. But i used to have a different one and it works with just one wash. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Eraessa S.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate description, came quickly and packaged well. Works ...
customer_reviews.text: Accurate description, came quickly and packaged well. Works well as a toner for bleached hair, does not strip my hair or leave purple hues. This is for weekly maintenance, not for correcting brassy hair so don’t expect exoect it to do professional level toning. I’ve ordered this twice now and I’ll keep buying it
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: I don’t see that this shampoo makes much of a difference to cancel out yellow tones. It leaves my hair feeling dry as well. I much rather use pravana blonde shampoo or matrix purple shampoo. I’ve noticed they lather better as well
customer_reviews.author: nataliem88

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is the best purple shampoo I’ve ever used. I have naturally dark brown hair and have spent so much time and money researching and trying other purple shampoos and none of them work the way this one does. I have found my go-to brand for purple shampoo and plan on purchasing this for as long as I have blonde hair.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Loe

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I discovered this sooner. Highly pigmented and does amazing bringing back silver!! Really takes away the yellow and tones some warmer orange even in my opinion. This is better suited for me over the Joico Blue Shampoo. Smells amazing too!
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: You only get 1!
customer_reviews.text: I should had read the description, but there are 2 bottles pictured, it's misleading. You only get 1! Kinda shady guys.
customer_reviews.author: Rory Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: I love the smell
customer_reviews.text: This worked really well. I had been using another brand and decided to try this after a co-worker raved about it. It smells really good and gives my hair some good texture after I use it . On top of that, it helps keep my blond highlights from going brassy between appts.
customer_reviews.author: Miles

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been using purple shampoo for some time now. Usually I buy shimmer lights, but this just became my new favorite. The scent and texture is great. It works really well even after using a few times I can tell my blonde is more vibrant. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylea LaRae

customer_reviews.title: I love it and will continue using it
customer_reviews.text: I tried several purple shampoos and masks including the high-end brands and this one is far my favorite! I will continue buying from this seller. My hair has lighten in only two shampoos. I let it be in my hair for 10-20 minutes. Loved it! I got good compliments on my hair now.. :)
customer_reviews.author: Addie

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing but stains!
customer_reviews.text: This product is STRONG. Which is exactly what I wanted, and compared to the Matrix So Silver, it is so much better. The only reason that I gave it 4 stars is that it stained my hands and nails. I applied while my hands were slightly dry, so that may be the reason why. The results are amazing, the product smells great, but not overpowering and a little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: anatomakeup

customer_reviews.title: Better than the rest!
customer_reviews.text: The best purple shampoo around. I am a natural strawberry blonde and my bleached hair comes up super yellow EVERY time. This is the only shampoo I’ve ever found that truly helps keep my cool toned platinum fresh and bright between salon colorings.
customer_reviews.author: Elaina

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for blondes!!
customer_reviews.text: My stylist recommended this shampoo for in between appts, it is amazing!!! I lather it on and am super generous, leave it sit for like 5 min, condition and go! My hair is always bright blonde after using this shampoo!
customer_reviews.author: Shop A Holic

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I am letting my gray grow out. My sister has been using this shampoo on her gray hair and told me about it. I have seen others on Facebook groups mention it, too. Works great and makes my hair so soft! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tootie-bell

customer_reviews.title: Stinky!
customer_reviews.text: This is the strongest smelling shampoo i have ever encountered! It smells like synthetic violets and chemicals. The smell was so strong i returned it with out using it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Need to use since I went grey. Good product line.
customer_reviews.author: lynnar

customer_reviews.title: You will not regret it. It’s amazing.
customer_reviews.text: If you’re a blond or a silver/grey person, this is your jam. It smells like “Michael,” by Michael Kors. I think it’s tuberose and it’s my favorite scent. However, that’s not the reason I love this shampoo. I’ve not found another that can bring out the shine and almost sparkle in silver hair. It’s unsurpassed so far for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Try it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m loving this shampoo so far. I’ve used a lot of purple shampoos over the last 20 years and this cuts the brassy tones in my blonde hair better than anything I’ve purchased. I wouldn’t say it’s the most conditioning but I haven’t noticed any additional dry out. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernMissy

customer_reviews.title: Best purple shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Best purple shampoo I’ve used. Smells great, lathers better than most other purple shampoos. And it really seems to minimize my brassiness; my hairdresser even noticed the difference. Also, not too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: A&P

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for getting rid of yellow tones in my bleached blonde hair. It goes beyond that and leaves my hair a beautiful silvery/lavender color. I only leave it on for a few minutes. I'm in love!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful on gray
customer_reviews.text: I have sandy blond hair and this really helps with all the gray coming in at my roots and the yellowing in my really blond areas. I use it twice a week
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more drabby highlights!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy its fragrance, however, my hair feels rather coarse after washing it. Then I use plenty of conditioner & argan oil to return & maintain hair softness. Joico shampoo keeps highlights looking fresh as day applied and prevents flat yellowing effects from dulling my hair color.
customer_reviews.author: belinda faye rhoden

customer_reviews.title: The best!!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best purple shampoo I’ve ever used. I’ve been trying to get an ashy blonde look which is hard with well water and a pool. I love the way this shampoo lathers, the smell and how much it brightens my hair. Be careful, it can stain your shower.
customer_reviews.author: MandaLynn

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but dries my hair out, so I use sparingly.
customer_reviews.text: It does the job to help the hair lighten up, but is drying to the hair. I let it sit in my hair for a few mins every time I use it, and only use it 1-2 times a week. It lightens up the blondes in my balayage.
customer_reviews.author: RagnarFryer

customer_reviews.title: Average product
customer_reviews.text: This was average product, Got this to take the brassy reds out of my hair, as it is transitioning to grey. Did not see a big difference. Also left my hair a little dry. Just not amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Teril63

customer_reviews.title: No seal no deal!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I ordered this I also ordered the conditioner. The conditioner came sealed and the shampoo did not, and it leaked everywhere! So I requested the shampoo bottle to be replaced. The replacement came in the next day but again it was not sealed! I’m confused on why the shampoo does not have a seal! I’m told never to use products that does not have a seal since they can be opening and putting something else in it... guess I’ll return this one as well. Pretty disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Kacy Jo

customer_reviews.title: Dried me out.
customer_reviews.text: This killed my hair. It dried it out horribly. And didn't remove any brass color or anything. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kenna

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe the difference this has made in my highlighted blonde hair. I'm actually letting my Grey grow out now because it looks so much better. Bought a bottle for my best friend, she loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: KY Mudd

customer_reviews.title: I like how this shampoo tones my hair
customer_reviews.text: I like how this shampoo tones my hair, removes the brassy and leaves a great color behind. I don't have the conditioner, but will need to get it since the shampoo leaves my hair feeling a bit dry.
customer_reviews.author: Apeter428

customer_reviews.title: My fav shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: So far the best purple shampoo I ever used. Found out about it on YouTube. Ordered a second bottle a bigger one. I love how it doesn’t dry my blonde hair like the others do, and it smells really good. Works great for the price. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: MilD

customer_reviews.title: Burning scalp
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo caused my scalp to burn for hours even after using my regular shampoo & conditioner. It was a dark purple and didn't smell too strong, but I won't be using again.
customer_reviews.author: Dev

customer_reviews.title: ❤️Joico
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of Joico products! This smells great! It’s a deep shade of purple to help with yellowing hair. You definitely need a conditioner after use, it doesn’t soften your hair at all. Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: HiFrancis!

customer_reviews.title: Only One Bottle
customer_reviews.text: The photo, and the Q&A below it, said to expect 2 bottles. I only rec'd one. This is not a good deal for almost $26. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Layla Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WONDERS
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Great way to keep up with you bleached hair when the salon just isn’t an option! The bottle says to leave it in for 1-2 minutes, but I personally leave it in for 45 minutes! That’s given me my best results yet! It will leave a tiny lavender hint in your hair but it’s barely noticeable and fades quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Danica Trisler

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this stuff for over a week now and can see a difference in my hair. My hair pulls gold/yellow tones like CRAZY! My hair stylist even said she's never seen someone pull yellow tones the way I do! And this stuff keeps my blonde BLONDE and helps it from turning gold/yellow!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep my platinum hair white
customer_reviews.text: I soak it in my hair for sometimes up to 20 min on dry hair before showering, or 10-15 on wet hair in the shower. Long soak times are cus I am always aiming for an overtoned purple, since it fades to a beautiful white blonde in a few days. Also love the huge bottle cus I go through purple shampoo like crazy.
customer_reviews.author: nazz3@aol.com or Leissa Nazzareno

customer_reviews.title: Great for colored hair
customer_reviews.text: Defiently took the yellow brassiness out of my hair and made my highlighted blonde whiter in color. I use it about once a week and it does the trick
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay M

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Lightens my platinum blonde color without over drying. Has a strange consistency (a little runny) & smell. Will leave stain on shower wall. The smell doesn’t stay on hair. I use this product 1-2x per week & would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney M.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money. Doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: I like Joico products in general but this product fails. It actually made my hair more brassy/ orange. Doesn't do what it claims.
customer_reviews.author: TETORTIZ

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo for white, blonde or highlighted hair
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and packaged well. This Joico shampoo is great for anyone with blonde highlights. Helps to keep the brassy or orange tint that sometimes comes with having grey hair or highlights. Makes my hair soft and smelling well. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A now believer
customer_reviews.text: It really brightened up the blonde and got ride of the dingy yellow tone. I wasn't sure if this product would do much, but I was wrong! I have extremely curly hair so I did do a deep conditioning afterwards. Im really happy this product is at least silicone free. For only using it once every 2 weeks i cant complain.
customer_reviews.author: Spaceyeti

customer_reviews.title: Cures Brassiness
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this shampoo for her bleached hair. It’s not the best smelling and it tends to dry her hair out. But, when her blonde locks turn brassy...this shampoo does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't not recommended. Too drying
customer_reviews.text: I got this shampoo and conditioner as a toner for blonde hair. Horribly drying. Worse than the bleach used in the hair to begin with. Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo but you literally have to use a ton of it if you have thick hair. It doesn’t lather up hardly so I had to mix it with my normal shampoo. It stains everything it comes in contact with. My hands were purple for days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brighter blonde!
customer_reviews.text: This REALLY made a difference in the color/tone of my hair and made my balayage brighter blonder and more dramatic. It did dry my hair out a little but not as much as Clairol Shimmer Lights probably would so I’d still recommend spending the extra money and buying this one since it worked so well. Love Joico products.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Parabens :(
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product to my hair dresser for use in her salon since it contains parabens. It seems to reduce brassy tones but the parabens irritate sensitive skin, so I will not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: YldPsyD

product_meta.title: Joico Color Balance Purple Shampoo 10.1 fl oz
product_meta.description: Joico's color balance purple color-balancing shampoo gently cleanses while neutralizing yellow tones to maintain blonde/gray hair.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
